*Captain America The winter soldier*

"Now more comic Accurate"

Cap: "I HATE YOU"

Hydra: "I HATE HIM"

Cap: "I ALSO HATE HIM"

Hydra: "BUT DOESNT THAT MEAN WE LIKE YOU THAN?"

Cap: "NO CUZ I HATE YOU TOO EVEN THOUGH I ALSO HATE THEM"

Hydra: "BUT WHAT IF WE SAY WE HATE THEM BUT LIKE YOU BUT HATE HIM WHICH MEANS WE HATE THEM BUT HATE YOU BUT LIKE YOU BUT HATE _YOU_ FOR HATING THEM WHILE HATING THEM FOR LIKEING YOU FOR HATING _THEM_"

Cap: *"FIESTA!"*

*[Cue Spanish party music even though his name is Captain _America_]*

topics.body:
Wait wait wait!
Ideeeeeeeaaaaaa~
[spoiler]Instead of making a huge political thing, what if in the film the Registration Act was really just a ploy by HYDRA to get information on heroes?! Avengers 2 and Ant-man showed that HYDRA is still very much alive and still has a wealth of resources at their disposal.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
So even though they don't have the money, the boyfriend's family is going ahead and making their trip to El Salvador. At least that 1,000 dollars in the fundraiser will take a _little_ weight off of their backs.

I know that this is pretty selfish, but I'm not going to see him for two weeks. The first time I really saw him for a while (apart from a trip to Micheal's, but about five of our friends were there two) was at the wake, and I would have liked to see him before he left...but he can't make it. And I already feel really, really bummed. Especially since he confided that although he'll play it up for his mom, he'll be miserable there because he won't be able to communicate with any of his friends deep in El Salvador's countryside, which is the only reason why he's been so okay about this entire situation.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442
